snippet: Guggenheim Partners said on Tuesday that it had hired Ross Levinsohn, a former Yahoo chief executive, to lead a new media unit that includes Billboard, Adweek and the Hollywood Reporter.
abstract: Guggenheim Partners said on Tuesday that it had hired Ross Levinsohn, a former Yahoo chief executive, to lead a new media unit that includes Billboard, Adweek and the Hollywood Reporter.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Guggenheim Hires Former Yahoo Chief for Media Venture
